summary:
Adds a Tower were you can store and display a lot of stuff.
In short its an otherworldly pocket dimension. :D
descriptionHtml:
[b]THE COLLECTORS TOWER[/b]

[b]About:[/b]
Need a place to store and display all your stuff?
This adds a little tower connecting all houses in the game. You can enter it from any house ingame.
In short it's an otherworldly pocket dimension. :D
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Features:[/b]
- around 30 mannequins
- around 50 displaycases for weapons and more
- around 100 weapon/shield holders
- 4 containers

- teleporter to every vanilla player home + dragonborn dlc player home
- teleport spell to the tower

[b]GER and ENG Version available. :)[/b]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Note: You have to own at least one house to be able to use the tower.

You can not wait on the tower (would be overpowerd) because the telport spell works everywhere and everytime except in combat...
Keep in mind that you can ONLY exit the tower with the teleporters to your vanilla player houses that you own...

The teleport spell telports you youst to the tower, but not back.
The Tower comes with his own worldspace which you can only enter via the spell or the portals.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]REQUIRES:[/b]
- Dragonborn DLC
- Skyrim 1.9.29.0.8 +

[b]LATEST VERSION:[/b]

1.4
- New small changes to the design of the tower
- Change the position of the Hjerim Sigil Stone to avoid conflicts with other house mods
- ...

1.3
- Imroved Teleport Spell Script (now you can not cast the spell if you are in combat)
- Fix the small Havok bug ;)
- Add an unique dwarven Staff and Dagger
- ...

1.2
- Improved the design of the tower (see new pictures)
- Fixed weapon rack holders
- Added activators to all display cases
- ...

1.1
- cleaned with TES Edit


Please report any bugs you've found.

Have fun!

[b]Please endorse if you like it. :)[/b]
Sorry English is not my native language hopfully you are able to read that.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Credits:[/b]
- Bethesda for the TES Skyrim and the CK!
- Projectz3
